page.title: 04FRISKNEY SPORT
page.content: Friskney & District Harriers has 200 members. Tennis Club has 2 grass courts-a club for pleasure rather than competition. Darts and pool teams from the Anchor Inn take part in inter -pub competitions The Outdoor Bowls Club competes in the local league-members range from 16 to 72. The Cricket Club has 40 fixtures a year both competitive and friendly. The Football Club has 2 teams competing in the Boston League. Friskney Bowmen Archery Club takes part in national and international competitions-one member is an ex-Europeon Champion. The Cricket and Football Clubs and the Harriers have a new joint pavillion. The swimming pool is funded and run by a committee of village people.
